StringTable.Label: TheArtifact_TheArtifact_Dec
StringTable.String: A strange Precursor Artifact has appeared out of a tear in space time near the capital world of the weakest race in known galaxy, it has begun emanating an energy field that seems to be greatly inserting their power.
